cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.view.content.selection

Interface Draggable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GraphDisplayable, MultiSelectableDraggable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FxModelClientNode, FxModelNode, FxModelNodeLabel, FxModelServerNode, TransparentDraggableEditableTextField

    public interface Draggable
    Draggable object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canOffsetNodeX(double offsetX)
      Checks whether object can be dragged from its current X coordinate to coordinate X + offsetX.
      boolean canOffsetNodeY(double offsetY)
      Checks whether object can be dragged from its current Y coordinate to coordinate Y + offsetY.
      void offsetNodeX(double offsetX)
      Offset node from it's current X coordinate to new coordinate X + offsetX
      void offsetNodeY(double offsetY)
      Offset node from it's current Y coordinate to new coordinate Y + offsetY

    • Method Detail

      • canOffsetNodeX

        boolean canOffsetNodeX(double offsetX)
        Checks whether object can be dragged from its current X coordinate to coordinate X + offsetX.
        Parameters:
        offsetX - X offset
        Returns:
        true if object can be dragged, false otherwise

      • canOffsetNodeY

        boolean canOffsetNodeY(double offsetY)
        Checks whether object can be dragged from its current Y coordinate to coordinate Y + offsetY.
        Parameters:
        offsetY - Y offset
        Returns:
        true if object can be dragged, false otherwise

      • offsetNodeX

        void offsetNodeX(double offsetX)
        Offset node from it's current X coordinate to new coordinate X + offsetX
        Parameters:
        offsetX - X offset

      • offsetNodeY

        void offsetNodeY(double offsetY)
        Offset node from it's current Y coordinate to new coordinate Y + offsetY
        Parameters:
        offsetY - Y offset
